original_text: And of some, that Elias had appeared; and of others, that one of the old prophets was risen again.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 엘리야가 나타났다고도 하며 어떤 사람은 옛 선지자 한 사람이 다시 살아났다고도 함이라

sentences.original_text: And of some, that Elias had appeared
that one of old prophets was risen again
sentences.korean_translation: 옛 선지자 중 한 사람이 다시 살아났다고 했다
